member.summary: Initializes an asynchronous instance of the HttpResponseStream class from the provided WebRequest instance.

member.name: T:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Binding.HttpResponseStream
member.summary: Wraps around the response stream.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Binding.HttpResponseStream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous read operation. Consider using ReadAsync instead.
member.param: The buffer to read the data into.
The byte offset in buffer at which to begin writing data read from the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous read, which could still be pending.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Binding.HttpResponseStream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous read to complete. Consider using ReadAsync instead.
member.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
member.returns: The number of bytes read from the stream, between zero (0) and the number of bytes you requested. Streams return zero (0) only at the end of the stream, otherwise, they should block until at least one byte is available.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Binding.HttpResponseStream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous write operation. Consider using WriteAsync instead.
member.param: The buffer to write data from.
The byte offset in buffer from which to begin writing.
The maximum number of bytes to write.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous write, which could still be pending.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Binding.HttpResponseStream.EndWrite(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends an asynchronous write operation. Consider using WriteAsync instead.
member.param: A reference to the outstanding asynchronous I/O request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the request timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 90 seconds.

member.summary: Gets or sets the response stream reading timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 300 seconds.

member.name: T:DocaLabs.Http.Client.HttpClientFactory
member.summary: Generates an implementation of HttpClient for a given interface.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.HttpClientFactory.CreateInstance``1(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a concrete class implementing the TInterface, the class is expected to be derived from HttpClient.
member.typeparam: Interface which should be implemented, the interface must implement only one method. The method's parameter type is not void it will be used as the TQuery generic parameter and the return type if it's not void as the TResult. The method can have any name. The method's implementation will call to TResult Execute(TQuery query) method of the HttpClient.
member.param: If the configuration name is used to get the endpoint configuration from the configuration file, if the parameter is null it will default to the interface's type full name.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.HttpClientFactory.CreateInstance``1(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a concrete class implementing the TInterface, the class is expected to be derived from HttpClient.
member.typeparam: Interface which should be implemented, the interface must implement only one method. The method's parameter type is not void it will be used as the TQuery generic parameter and the return type if it's not void as the TResult. The method can have any name. The method's implementation will call to TResult Execute(TQuery query) method of the HttpClient.
member.param: The base URL of the service.
If the configuration name is used to get the endpoint configuration from the configuration file, if the parameter is null it will default to the interface's type full name.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.HttpClientFactory.CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a concrete class implementing the interfaceType, the class is derived from HttpClient.
member.param: Interface which should be implemented, the interface must implement only one method. The method's parameter type is not void it will be used as the TQuery generic parameter and the return type if it's not void as the TResult. The method can have any name. The method's implementation will call to TResult Execute(TQuery query) method of the HttpClient.
The base URL of the service.
If the configuration name is used to get the endpoint configuration from the configuration file, if the parameter is null it will default to the interface's type full name.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.HttpClientFactory.CreateInstance``1(System.Type,System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a concrete class implementing the interfaceType, the class is derived from baseType.
member.typeparam: Interface which should be implemented, the interface must implement only one method. The method's parameter type is not void it will be used as the TQuery generic parameter and the return type if it's not void as the TResult. The method can have any name. The method's implementation will call to TResult Execute(TQuery query) method of the HttpClient.
member.param: The base class which will be used to generate the concrete type implementing the interface. The class must have non default constructor: (Uri baseUrl, string configurationName, Func<Func<TResult>, TResult> retryStrategy) or (Uri baseUrl, string configurationName)
The base URL of the service.
If the configuration name is used to get the endpoint configuration from the configuration file, if the parameter is null it will default to the interface's type full name.

member.name: M:DocaLabs.Http.Client.HttpClientFactory.CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Type,System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a concrete class implementing the interfaceType, the class is derived from baseType.
member.param: The base class which will be used to generate the concrete type implementing the interface. The class must have non default constructor: (Uri baseUrl, string configurationName, Func<Func<TResult>, TResult> retryStrategy) or (Uri baseUrl, string configurationName)

Interface which should be implemented, the interface must implement only one method. The method's parameter type is not void it will be used as the TQuery generic parameter and the return type if it's not void as the TResult. The method can have any name. The method's implementation will call to TResult Execute(TQuery query) method of the HttpClient.
The base URL of the service.
If the configuration name is used to get the endpoint configuration from the configuration file, if the parameter is null it will default to the interface's type full name.

member.name: P:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Utils.JsonSerialization.SerializationSettings.Type
member.summary: The type of the value being serialized. This parameter is used when Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling" is Auto to write out the type name if the type of the value does not match. Specifying the type is optional. The default value is null.

member.name: P:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Utils.JsonSerialization.SerializationSettings.Formatting
member.summary: Indicates how the output is formatted. The default value is None.

member.name: P:DocaLabs.Http.Client.Utils.JsonSerialization.SerializationSettings.Settings
member.summary: The settings used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be is used. The default value is null.
